mapper.select: SELECT transaction_id, account_id, stock_code, stock_name, transaction_type, order_type, quantity, price, order_price, total_amount, DATE_FORMAT(executed_at, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as executedAt, DATE_FORMAT(order_created_at, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as orderCreatedAt FROM transactions WHERE account_id IN (SELECT account_id FROM user_accounts WHERE user_id = #{userId}) ORDER BY executed_at DESC
